contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Ouffet |picture=Ouffet JPG03.jpg |picture-legend= |map=Ouffet Liège Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Ouffet in the province of Liège |arms= |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LG}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Huy|Huy]] |nis=61048 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Marc Gielen (EC) |majority=EC |postal-codes=4590 |telephone-area=086 |web=[http://www.ouffet.be/ www.ouffet.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=26 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=28 }} '''Ouffet''' is a [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]]. It lies in the country's [[Wallonia|Walloon Region]] and [[Liege (province)|Province of Liege]]. On January 1, 2006 Ouffet had a total population of 2,529. The total area is 40.22 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 63 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} [[Image:Ouffet CH1 JPG.jpg|thumb|left|The castle (XVIIIth century)|275px]] {{Liege municipalities}} [[Category:Municipalities of Liège (province)]] {{Liege-geo-stub}}
